hopobject.name: 2016-03-09-sancloud-launches-indiegogo
hopobject.http_browser: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_8_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/49.0.2623.112 Safari/537.36
hopobject.body:
SanCloud Launches Indiegogo campaign for SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced
by Jason Kridner and Marc Murphy

SanCloud are proud to announce the launch of their crowd funding campaign on Indiegogo for the SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced. Early bird rewards start as low as $52.

The SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced is ready for take-off.....

SanCloud is enhancing the open source hardware BeagleBone Black design you love with more features than you thought possible! It still has a blistering 1GHz processor and just like the BeagleBone Black, has two 46-pin expansion headers, micro HDMI for audio/video output, USB ports, Ethernet and other I/O features. Enhancements include gigabit Ethernet, a gigabyte of RAM, additional USB host ports, several sensors like an accelerometer, gyro, barometer and thermometer and an option for WiFi and Bluetooth. The SanCloud BeagleBone Enhanced is an ultra-powered embedded computer that can (still) fit in a mint tin!

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/sancloud-beaglebone-enhanced/x/12199680#/
